summary: The Air National Guard Squadron Preservation Act of 2025 aims to ensure the Air National Guard's fighter units are fully recapitalized. It mandates the Secretary of the Air Force to procure advanced capability and fifth-generation fighter aircraft until all legacy aircraft in covered units are replaced.  The bill includes a GAO review and report on aircraft procurement challenges and a feasibility study on advanced capability fighter aircraft needs. It defines key terms like 'advanced capability fighter aircraft' and 'covered Air National Guard fighter unit.'
